website_summaries.verdict: Contains 5 color-coded resistance bands, disc sliders, and a domed half-balance ball.
pros: A good-quality variation on Pilates equipment, this all-purpose set can also be used for yoga and other core strengthening exercises
The disc sliders make for a fun and challenging addition to the workout
cons: The little bumps on the domed ball can be hard on the feet

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: This was given as a birthday gift. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Mig & Steve

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and move around
customer_reviews.text: I like the product becsuse it is eady to use and move around. Convenient since I don’t have to leave my house.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Resistance Bands need better instructions say 5 different resistance but doesn’t tell you how
customer_reviews.text: Product came in time and is well put together. Just would like to know how to tighten the stretch bands. They are way too stretchy no resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Collis

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your home gym!
customer_reviews.text: This set is great to add to a home gym. I love it and use it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Great workout set!
customer_reviews.text: I really like that all of these products came together. I am a gymnastics coach, and I will be using these products to aid in training during practices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Set
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need for your home gym! Great workout aerobic and core all in one kit. Goodbye GYM
customer_reviews.author: Dima V.

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be made well enough to hold up for a while, and the added accessories are a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Darling

customer_reviews.title: Missing Air Stoppers
customer_reviews.text: I by mistake wrote that the 2 Air Stoppers were missing but I did find them. I apologize. MY mistake
customer_reviews.author: Margareta Wilkmar

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The versatility and options for various workouts. I train at peoples homes, easy to take along!
customer_reviews.author: DeVere Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great value pack
customer_reviews.text: Great bosu ball quality very durable and easy to use and the accessories is AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: Shlomy

product_meta.title: 23 inch Half Balance Ball with Straps, Elastic Resistance Bands & Slide Discs | Anti Slip, Durable & Portable | for Core Training, Yoga, Pilates. by Insane Move 2019 New
product_meta.description:
Take Your Training Sessions To The Next Level With An Insane Move Workout Set! 

Trying to...

... lose excess weight?

... burn stubborn fat?

... tone your whole body?

... improve your overall health?

... ameliorate your training sessions?

No more trying. Get the ultimate 2018 training kit, make all your dreams come true and skyrocket your workouts from this day on. Sculpt your body like never before and gain that lost confidence back. 

Everything You Need For A Full Body Workout! 

Forget about cheaply made balance balls. Forget about poorly stretching resistance bands. Forget about disc gliders not sliding smoothly. Invest in an Insane Move unique training kit and find your peace of mind again. 

It includes a large domed half training balance ball which has a pair of resistance handles, an air pump, and a valve pump. Made of high-quality anti-burst PVC and non-slip rigid ABS base, this half fitness ball can lift up to 300 pounds. Use it for greater balance and stability. 

The 5 resistance bands included have different colors so as to choose the resistance level that satisfies your training needs. They are lightweight, compact and portable. Fit in your backpack, glove compartment and even your handbag. Ameliorate your strength training workouts. 

Resistance levels:

X-Light: Green

Light: Blue

Medium: Yellow

Heavy: Red

X-Heavy: Black

Last but not least, this set wouldn’t be complete without a pair of disc sliders. These sliding discs can withstand even the toughest workouts. Add some spice to your workouts, fire up your core training sessions and work out on any surface. 

Train Any Place You Want!

· Gym.


· Home.


· Outdoors.


· Garage.


· Living room.

· Dorms. 


· Office. 


What are you waiting for? Get yours today!

Scroll Up & Click Add To Cart Now!
feature_bullets: 💪 DELUXE TRAINING PACK –GREAT FOR ALL:Search no more for the coolest and fullest training gear. Insane Move will get you moving in no time at all. Each BRAND new 2018 fitness pack includes a half balance ball with resistance straps and an air pump, 5 elastic training bands with different resistance levels and 2 sliding discs for core training. Everything you need to get that dreamy body you have always wanted.

💪 FIND YOUR BALANCE AGAIN: Facilitate your Yoga and Pilates sessions with our antI-burst balance training ball. Thanks to it's ergonomic design and non slip craftsmanship you may rest assured that this ball will stay put no matter how hard your training is. Enhance stretching, ameliorate your poses, improve your cardiovascular health, strengthen your core and find your balance. Rejuvenate both your body and mind.

💪 CHOOSE THE RESISTANCE LEVEL: Designed to please even your most demanding training needs, our resistance bands come in 5 different levels of resistance and thickness. Choose the one that suits your needs and skyrocket your next leg workout. Achieve better and faster results in no time at all. Ideal for women and men, athletes and amateurs alike, professional training, therapy, CrossFit, cardio, gym workouts and more.

💪 FACILITATE CORE TRAINING: Enhance your core workouts and worry no more about sliding discs having trouble on hardwood surfaces. Our disc sliders work perfectly on any surface imaginable. From tile floors, wood, marble and laminate to cement, carpets and the ground. Enjoy care free disc sliding, improve your flexibility, tone your abs and fortify your core muscles. Ideal for pushups, planks, lunges, arm slides or mountain climbers.

💪TRY THIS ADVANCED2018 WORKOUT COMBO RISK FREE: Satisfying our customers is our top priority. That is why this premium training packis backed by our unconditional money back guarantee! In the unlikely event of ever having any issues with it. Get yours today and transform your whole body from head to toe. Not much of a fitness enthusiast? Pleasantly surprise a beloved family member or friend who really is!
